description: Phillip Hermore is overworked and stressed out. Exams and a full load of classes have him chasing his tail trying to keep up. He feels like he is slipping and is worried about flunking out of school. Luckily, one of Phillip's professors is Cody Cummings, and in Professor Cummings' class, he emphasizes the importance of visualization and relaxation. When Phillip does not quite seem to grasp what Prof. Cummings is talking about, the teacher shows the student with a ?hands on? demonstration.In no time, Phillip will understand the value in taking a load off. Of course, by then, he'll be taking it off his face.Enjoy!
title: Take A Load Off
